text:
Hi team.

I'm wondering if there's a PUBLIC_APP_ACCESS_TOKEN for public App card just as the PRIVATE_APP_ACCESS_TOKEN for private UI extension? I guess the answer is NO, right? Because the PRIVATE_APP_ACCESS_TOKEN is for app.functions while public APP has no app.functions running on the HubSpot host.

Am just starting with UI extensions and was wondering whether this type of component can be built? Is this a variation of the `Select` component? Didnâ€™t see anything in the docs that referred to a Load more action or comboboxes
